scripts.surge: surge ./test/fixtures/frames/main applitools-test-frames.surge.sh && surge ./test/fixtures/frames/frame1 applitools-test-frames-1.surge.sh && surge ./test/fixtures/frames/frame2 applitools-test-frames-2.surge.sh
scripts.test: yarn test:unit && yarn test:it && yarn test:e2e
scripts.test:tmp: mocha --no-timeouts test/coverage/custom/* # TEST AND REMOVE SCRIPT AFTER PR 151 MERGE !!
scripts.coverage:sandbox: coverage-tests create-tests && yarn test:coverage && coverage-tests process-report
scripts.coverage:prod: coverage-tests create-tests && yarn test:coverage && coverage-tests process-report --send-report prod
scripts.test:coverage: yarn start-chromedriver && env APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=uuidgen XUNIT_FILE=coverage-test-report.xml mocha-parallel-tests --no-timeouts --reporter spec-xunit-file --max-parallel 15 test/coverage/generic/*.spec.js
scripts.stop-chromedriver: ps ax | grep chromedriver | grep port=4444 | awk '{print $1}' | xargs kill -9
